title: Border, 16th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of laid cords with needle lace (reticella style), edge of punto in aria
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border with geometric pattern of squares showing alternating human shapes and star motif. Edged with triangular pendants.
